review: worked right out of the box.

review: Received the Firestick,setup was easy,am very happy with my purchase, :)

review: Love it! It's so much faster than my Blu-ray player with Prime and Netflix. But the remote could use a little work. Rewinding is always a crapshoot.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Like the different apps, don't like is that you can be charge without knowing

review: love this product just needs more apps and i guess it will get better
author: courtney c.

review: I guess I'm pretty much floored how a little gizmo like this could be so wonderful!! And it doesn't make it any worse that I got it from Amazon at s record low price. Now I can pretty much watch tv 24/7. If I want to. My favorite part is that I can pause it and I can skip commercials.

review: not loving it, a lot of issues that do get solved but really a pain in the butt. Can't watch most shows that I love with prime so what is the point, going to return probably

review: It should include Google to search the web and it would be complete.
